name: Herb Garden
description: Herbs and spices are grown here. They make food taste better, reducing the amount of food people need. Also has an extra effect depending on the herb type.

modes.name: Culinary Herbs
modes.description: Increases the capacity of restaurants to the left and right of the garden.

modes.name: Medicinal Herbs
modes.description: Improves the medical happiness. Herb gardens can't provide more than 20% of the medical happiness in total.
